Enable('DSCRPTR_31_PRI_LVL', Eq('NUM_INT_BDS', '32'));\ Enable('PRI_1_NUM_OF_BEATS', GtOrEq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '2'));\ Enable('PRI_2_NUM_OF_BEATS', GtOrEq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '3'));\ Enable('PRI_3_NUM_OF_BEATS', GtOrEq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '4'));\ Enable('PRI_4_NUM_OF_BEATS', GtOrEq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '5'));\ Enable('PRI_5_NUM_OF_BEATS', GtOrEq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '6'));\ Enable('PRI_6_NUM_OF_BEATS', GtOrEq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '7'));\ Enable('PRI_7_NUM_OF_BEATS', Eq('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '8'));\ Enable('INT_1_QUEUE_DEPTH', GtOrEq('NUM_OF_INTS', '2'));\ Enable('INT_2_QUEUE_DEPTH', GtOrEq('NUM_OF_INTS', '3'));\ Enable('INT_3_QUEUE_DEPTH', Eq('NUM_OF_INTS', '4'));\ Enable('ECC', And(Neq('FAMILY', 'SmartFusion2'), Neq('FAMILY', 'IGLOO2')));\ Validate('Priority 0 number of beats must be 256 when the AXI4-Stream interface is enabled', Or(And(Eq('PRI_0_NUM_OF_BEATS', '256'), Eq('AXI4_STREAM_IF', '1')), Eq('AXI4_STREAM_IF', '0')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_0_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097'));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '2'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_1_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '3'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_2_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '4'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_3_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '5'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_4_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '6'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_5_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '7'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_6_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum transaction size of 4 KB on the DMA interface. Invalid AXI data width & number of transfers combination', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '8'), Less(Mul(Div('AXI_DMA_DWIDTH', '8'), 'PRI_7_NUM_OF_BEATS'), '4097')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '2'), GtOrEq('PRI_0_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_1_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '3'), GtOrEq('PRI_1_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_2_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '4'), GtOrEq('PRI_2_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_3_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '5'), GtOrEq('PRI_3_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_4_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '6'), GtOrEq('PRI_4_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_5_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '7'), GtOrEq('PRI_5_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_6_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Maximum number of beats must be equal to or least than that of the preceeding prioirty level', Or(Less('NUM_PRI_LVLS', '8'), GtOrEq('PRI_6_NUM_OF_BEATS', 'PRI_7_NUM_OF_BEATS')));\ Validate('Out of range of number of priority levels specified.', Gt('NUM_PRI_LVLS', spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:description: CoreAXI4DMAController is an AXI4 DMA controller designed to perform memory to memory style DMA (Direct Memory Access) transfers in an AXI system. In addition the core provides a bridge to AXI4 memory-mapped slaves for AXI4-Stream masters.
